# CBAs  por hito de revisión de anchoveta centro-sur

```{r CCTPP_CBAporHito,include=T, message=F,warning=F,eval=F, echo=FALSE,fig.height=3,fig.width=6,fig.align="center",fig.path="FigurasCCTPP_Octubre/", dev=c('pdf', 'bmp')}
library(stringr)
library(lattice)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape)
library(dplyr)
library(ggthemes)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)

year<-    c(2014,2015,2016,2017,2018,2019,2020,2021,2022)
CBAhito1<-c(42200,34400,34400,58400,49440,81347,162876,210167,173315)
CBAhito2<-c(42200,34400,39900,58400,49440,120500,162876,210167,236223)
CBAhito3<-c(NA,34400,39900,58400,59500,127150,162876,210167,236223)
Desembarques <- c(56842,63168,71985,55709,61176,160968,166031,155982,NA)


ind           <- cbind(CBAhito1,CBAhito2,CBAhito3,Desembarques) 
data          <- data.frame(ind) %>% mutate (Asesoria='data')%>% mutate (yrs= year)%>%melt(id.var=c('yrs', 'Asesoria'))

f1 <- ggplot(data, aes(yrs,value,colour=variable))+ geom_line()+ geom_point( size=2, shape=21, fill="white") + 
      labs(x = 'Años', y = 'CBA y desembarques  (toneladas)')  +
      scale_colour_manual(values=c(4,3,2,1))+
      theme_bw(base_size=9) + 
      ggtitle('')+
      theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
f1

```
